en-us.status: This service is currently in the process of being approved for open sourcing.

features.title: Language Detection
features.description: Determines the languages present in a section of text

features.title: Boilerplate Removal
features.description: Removes commonly used text such as legal disclaimers

features.title: Classification
features.description: Uses natural language processing to classify data into user-defined categories

features.title: Email Signature Detection
features.description: Automatically identifies and segregates signature sections from emails

features.title: Email Key Content Segregation
features.description: Separates the top reply of email from previous replies

features.title: Numeric ID Tagging
features.description: Applies a unique identifier to files processed by the Data Processing service for tracking purposes

features.title: Entity Extraction
features.description: Constructs structured data, such as addresses, from unstructured text

features.title: OCR
features.description: Extracts text from images for further data processing actions

features.title: Speech
features.description: Extracts text from audio for further data processing actions

features.title: Text Extract
features.description: Extracts text, metadata and sub files from a wide range of file types
